label: Property Auctions
description: Auctions for buying and selling properties, including houses, land, and commercial properties.
intents: Learn about the auction process for properties

subcategories.label: Residential Properties
subcategories.description: Auctions for buying and selling houses, apartments, and other residential properties.

subcategories.label: Commercial Properties
subcategories.description: Auctions for buying and selling commercial properties, including offices, retail spaces, and warehouses.

subcategories.label: Land
subcategories.description: Auctions for buying and selling land, including agricultural land, development land, and building plots.
